description.value: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them. When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} foe, your target takes [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage}. On a critical success, the target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage plus your sneak attack damage.
